Overworld

make it yours

scroll
project summary:

A comprehensive worldbuilding program designed to assist worldbuilders in creating rich, complex, and interwoven worlds.

outcome

Prototype & Brand

role: UI/UX, interaction design

tools:

Figma Illustrator

time period: Dec. 2022 – May 2023

view Overworld prototypes

final outcome

Overworld is a comprehensive worldbuilding program designed to assist users in creating rich, complex, and interwoven worlds. Whether someone is creating for a Role Playing Game such as Dungeons & Dragons or for any other creative endeavors, it offers an array of tools and features to help users organize and visualize the different elements of their world. Overworld’s large connected graph displays relationships between items, allowing users to see how different aspects of their world impact each other. Users can add maps, boards, character sheets, and more to view details about their worlds and its connections. It’s a suite of tools for worldbuilding, perfect for creators.

last updated: 5.22.2023
